title: League Client
body:
Ever since last night after login issue, my client is bugged.
-It's laggy and character inking isnt working.

For a note. My alt is lvl 27 , when i sign in it says i need to be lvl 7 or higher to make a discussion?

replies.body:
Today I also noticed that character inking wasn't working for me. I'm not sure if it has always been like this and I only noticed it now, but it seems that it only works if 'Character Quality' is set to 'Medium' or higher.
Would be nice if someone could clarify if this is the intended behaviour. If it is, it probably wouldn't cause so much confusion if the option would automatically be disabled (and grayed out) when the lower character quality options were selected.

First, your client sounds like its losing connection to the Server. This issue is easily fixed by running through the [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743)!

Second, if you let me know the Summoner name and Region of your second account I can sync it up so that you're able to post on the boards!
